original_definition: 'FCR full activation time' means the time period between the occurrence of the reference incident and the corresponding full activation of the FCR;
generated_definition: 'FCR full activation time' means the time it takes for a full-container return (fcr) to be fully activated, including the preparation, transportation, and delivery of the empty container.

Article 3: ‘FCR full activation time’ means the time period between the occurrence of thereference incident and the corresponding full activation of the FCR;
